function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential risk of indoor airborne transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear role of airborne particles in virus transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of virus by asymptomatic individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide range of droplet sizes emitted during speaking and coughing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High rate of particle emission during vocalization and breathing activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in discriminating between airborne transmission and transmission through respiratory droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in aerosols in hospital environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investigating size distribution of airborne sars-cov-2 droplets in a specific location during the covid-19 outbreak.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resuspension of virus-laden aerosols from the surface of protective apparel worn by medical staff.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of particle matter from walking events in indoor spaces.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of bioaerosols and virus particles in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quantitative data for defining environmental control measures against covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Outbreaks of covid-19 linked to common indoor environmental factors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in the restaurant led to the spread of covid-19 through aerosol transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection rates in a call center in seoul, south korea, due to close proximity and potential aerosol transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 in a crowded workplace environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High secondary infection rate in choir practice","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of infection in meat-processing plant","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in a meat-processing plant due to poor ventilation and crowded environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through the air at a distance of 2m or more in a confined and crowded environment.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Control of infectious aerosols by ventilation, filtration, and uv germicidal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor transmission of contagious diseases such as influenza a and sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact in
